channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch Bad Moves Play Their Farewell Show In D.C.
item.description: 🎸 Saying goodbye in style! Don't miss Bad Moves' farewell show in D.C. 🎶 Let's rock one last time! 🤘 #BadMoves #FarewellShow

item.title: Watch Iggy Pop Sing Superman Hit “Punkrocker” Live For The First Time
item.description: 🎤 Iggy Pop brings the 🔥 with a live debut of "Punkrocker"! Watch him in action now! 🤘 #IggyPop #LiveMusic

item.title: Destiny’s Child Reunite At Beyonce’s Cowboy Carter Tour Finale
item.description: 🌟 Destiny's Child back together for an epic Beyonce finale! 🎤👯‍♀️ Who's ready to witness this iconic reunion? #DestinysChild #BeyonceTour

item.title: See Bleachers Bring Out Hayley Williams, Jeff Tweedy During All-Star Newport Folk Fest Set
item.description: 🎶 Bleachers had Newport Folk Fest lit 🔥 with surprise guests Hayley Williams and Jeff Tweedy! Who's next? 🌟 #NewportFolkFest #MusicMagic

item.title: Billy Joel Shares Previously Unreleased Demos, Outtakes, And Live Tracks With Many More To Come
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the musical treasure trove! 🌟 Billy Joel unveils hidden gems for fans to savor. 🎹 #BillyJoel #MusicDiscovery
